This week we will delve into working with data in R, from importing data to tidying and wrangling.

## Learning Outcomes

**By the end of the week you will be able to:**

1.  Explain and demonstrate use of the basic functionality of R including working with objects, operators and various data types

2.  Import data from various different sources

3.  Carry out initial exploration of your data using functions from dplyr, tidyr and ggplot2 packages

4.  Explain and demonstrate use of the key elements required when creating visualisations in ggplot2
